revision.text:
{{Infobox Berry |name = Lum |image = [[File:Lum.png]] |caption = This Berry's gradual process of storing nutrients beneficial to Pokémon health causes it to mature slowly. This Berry minorly promotes the growth of Berry plants around it. |growtime = 1h 0m 0s |harvest = 2 berries |replant = 0% |points = 1,000 ||flavor =
*10 spicy *10 dry *10 sweet *10 bitter *0 sour }} '''Lum''' is a type of [[Berries|Berry]] that can be planted in [[Farm]]. It can be obtained by surrounding an empty plot with all 8 berries from page 1 in the ripe stage. {| class="wikitable" |+ Growth Stages ! !! Sprout !! Taller !! Bloom !! Berry |- ! Time passed since planting | 50 mins || 53 mins 20 secs || 56 mins 40 secs || 1 hour - 2 hours |- ! Animation |
[[File:AllTreeSprout.png|50px]] ||
[[File:LumTreeTaller.png|50px]] ||
[[File:LumTreeBloom.png|50px]] ||
[[File:LumTreeBerry.png|50px]] |} === Possible Planting Formations === You can fill your [[farm]] in following way to obtain Lum berry. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |+ Farm |- style="height: 50px;" | style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Sitrus.png|30px]] [[Sitrus]] || style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Oran.png|30px]] [[Oran]] || style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Aspear.png|30px]] [[Aspear]] || style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Oran.png|30px]] [[Oran]] || style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Sitrus.png|30px]] [[Sitrus]] |- | [[File:Leppa.png|30px]] [[Leppa]] || || [[File:Pecha.png|30px]] [[Pecha]] || || [[File:Leppa.png|30px]] [[Leppa]] |- style="height: 50px;" | [[File:Rawst.png|30px]] [[Rawst]] || [[File:Chesto.png|30px]] [[Chesto]] || [[File:Cheri.png|30px]] [[Cheri]] || [[File:Chesto.png|30px]] [[Chesto]] || [[File:Rawst.png|30px]] [[Rawst]] |- | [[File:Leppa.png|30px]] [[Leppa]] || || [[File:Pecha.png|30px]] [[Pecha]] || || [[File:Leppa.png|30px]] [[Leppa]] |- | [[File:Sitrus.png|30px]] [[Sitrus]] || [[File:Oran.png|30px]] [[Oran]] || [[File:Aspear.png|30px]] [[Aspear]] || [[File:Oran.png|30px]] [[Oran]] || [[File:Sitrus.png|30px]] [[Sitrus]] |} {{Berries}}

{{Infobox Berry |name = Lum |image = [[File:Lum.png]] |caption = This Berry's gradual process of storing nutrients beneficial to Pokémon health causes it to mature slowly. This Berry minorly promotes the growth of Berry plants around it. |growtime = 1h 0m 0s |harvest = 2 berries |replant = 0% |points = 1,000 ||flavor =
*10 spicy *10 dry *10 sweet *10 bitter *0 sour }} '''Lum''' is a type of [[Berries|Berry]] that can be planted in [[Farm]]. It can be obtained by surrounding an empty plot with all 8 berries from page 1 in the ripe stage. {| class="wikitable" |+ Growth Stages ! !! Sprout !! Taller !! Bloom !! Berry |- ! Time passed since planting | 50 mins || 53 mins 20 secs || 56 mins 40 secs || 1 hour - 2 hours |- ! Animation |
[[File:AllTreeSprout.png|50px]] ||
[[File:LumTreeTaller.png|50px]] ||
[[File:LumTreeBloom.png|50px]] ||
[[File:LumTreeBerry.png|50px]] |} === Possible Planting Formations === You can fill your [[farm]] in following way to obtain Lum berry. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |+ Farm |- | style="width: 40px;" | [[Sitrus]] || style="width: 40px;" | [[Oran]] || style="width: 40px;" | [[Aspear]] || style="width: 40px;" | [[Oran]] || style="width: 40px;" | [[Sitrus]] |- | [[Leppa]] || || [[Pecha]] || || [[Leppa]] |- style="height: 26px;" | [[Rawst]] || [[Chesto]] || [[Cheri]] || [[Chesto]] || [[Rawst]] |- | [[Leppa]] || || [[Pecha]] || || [[Leppa]] |- | [[Sitrus]] || [[Oran]] || [[Aspear]] || [[Oran]] || [[Sitrus]] |} {{Berries}}
